name: Array

methods.name: concat
methods.description: Returns a new array created by concatenating the given values to the end of the original array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Any number of values to be added to the end of the array.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Joins all elements of the array into a string; optionally, each element is separated by delimiter.

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: A string used to separate each element of the array.

methods.name: reverse
methods.description: Reverses the order of the elements in the array.

methods.name: slice
methods.description: Creates a new array, which contains a subset of the original array's elements.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the elements of the array in place, using the given function to compare to elements.

parameters.name: userFunction
parameters.description: A user-supplied function of the form userFunction(a, b) which returns less than 0 if a is greater than b, 0 if a and b are equal, and greater than 0 if b is greater than a.

methods.name: pop
methods.description: Removes the last element from the array, decreases the length by 1, and returns the value of the element.

methods.name: push
methods.description: Places one or more values onto the end of the array and increases length by n.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Any number of values to be pushed onto the end of the array.

methods.name: splice
methods.description: Removes num elements from the array beginning with index, start.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The index of the first element to remove. Negative values are relative to the end of the array.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: The number of array elements to remove, including start. If omitted, all elements from array index start to the end of the array are removed.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: A list of one or more values to be added to the array starting at index start.

methods.name: shift
methods.description: Removes the first element from the array, decreases the length by 1, and returns the value of the element.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Converts an array to a string and returns the string.

methods.name: toLocaleString
methods.description: Converts an array to a string and returns the string (localized).

methods.name: unshift
methods.description: Adds one or more elements to the beginning of the array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The values of one or more elements to be added to the beginning of the array.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Creates a string representation of this object that can be fed back to

description: An array with integer indexing and a
